scripts.start: npm run sed:clearConsole.js && npm run sed:WebpackDevServerUtils.js && react-scripts start
scripts.sed:WebpackDevServerUtils.js: sed -i 's#^function printInstructions(appName, urls, useYarn) {$#function printInstructions(appName, urls, useYarn) { return;#g' ./node_modules/react-dev-utils/WebpackDevServerUtils.js
